remarks: Property of Archimedean ordered groups, framing positive ` Y ` between multiples of ` X ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Apr-2018.)
statement:
archirng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
archirng.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
archirng.i $e |- .< = ( lt ` W ) $.
archirng.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` W ) $.
archirng.x $e |- .x. = ( .g ` W ) $.
archirng.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. oGrp ) $.
archirng.2 $e |- ( ph -> W e. Archi ) $.
archirng.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
archirng.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
archirng.5 $e |- ( ph -> .0. .< X ) $.
archirng.6 $e |- ( ph -> .0. .< Y ) $.
archirng $p |- ( ph -> E. n e. NN0 ( ( n .x. X ) .< Y /\ Y .<_ ( ( n + 1 ) .x. X ) ) ) $.
$d .0. n $.
$d .< n $.
$d .<_ n $.
$d .x. n $.
$d X n $.
$d Y n $.
$d n ph $.
